content.detailedDescription: I was doing photo to tehran and in my photo i have seen an object who was invisible with my eye
content.summary: 10 minutes late of observation i was shoked

content.detailedDescription:
On 31 december 2013, at approx. 0120 hours, the following occurred. while walking my dog on the street in front of my residence, i observed numerous purple colored round lighted objects in a neighbor's tree. the lights emitted more of a fuzzy 'aura' than a glow. i observed a single matching single light on another neighbor's garage, some 30 feet away from the others. i wear corrective lenses, so the first thing i did was look away and then back again. the lighted objects were still there. thinking my rods and cones may not yet be acclimated to the darkness, i walked my dog about 80 feet down the street, watching the objects the entire time. these objects did not flash, change color, or move in any way. nor did any sound emanate from them that i could hear. i swept them with the beam of a flashlight and there was no reaction. i continued watching them for another 4-5 minutes before returning inside my residence.

as a 62 year old retired police detective, i am not prone to flights of fancy. what i saw were not christmas lights. the tree they were in had shed it's leaves and there were no wires connecting these things to an unseen power source. the lights have not returned as of this writing.

although these lights were not flying, i find them sufficiently unidentifiable to warrant making this notification to you.
content.summary: Numerous purple lights on tree limbs & garage. not holiday lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was woken by my husband whom had seen it first. the main event that he observed was the light appeared out of no where and seemed to maintain a continual path. they did act intelligently by avoiding collision with each other and even stopping in flight to wait for the spacing is the same. they would drop into the sky from unknown origin and would maintain a steady flow until they would seem to just fade out like they had ran out of energy. it appeared that had a good maneuverability and can maintain a very low distance while avoiding collision with anything.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Football shaped and would fade out

content.detailedDescription: We went for a walk in glendale, az. off of union hills ave. and witnessed 2 orbs hovering.  the lights were white at first, but then changed to a red-orange color and back to white.  we didn't know what could be flying so low and so bright.  we walked faster to try and reach the two orbs, but as we got closer they began moving southwest at about 15 to 20 mph. we walked about another 3 blocks north and a third orb appeared. it didn't look as big as the other two, and we didn't see where it came from.  it also moved in the same direction as the other 2 orbs and at the same speed.  we couldn't hear if they were making any noise because there were several cars passing on the main road. frankly, i don't know what to make of it. it was an incredible sight.  we lost sight of the three orbs as they flew over some apartments.
content.summary: Two orbs were hovering north of 39th ave. as we approached union hills they began moving sw. then a third one appeared from the north and followed the other two.

content.detailedDescription:
I was helping my friend and his mom unload spring water we collected in jugs earlier in the day from the car. it was a little past 6:30 pm, the sun was already down- it was fairly dark outside. as i grabbed the first water jug about to take it into the house, a bright light in the sky caught my eye. 

it was very clear outside- exceptionally clear considering it has been cloudy almost everyday last week. i pointed it out to my friend and he pointed it out to his mother, and we watched and noted that it was a very bright white star like light- unchanging, no blinking lights or reflections. if i had to guess its height, i would say (imagining that there were clouds in the sky) below normal cloud height, moving at a perfect slower pace than that of a helicopter or airplane, leaving no trail behind it, moving in a perfect line heading east. what puzzled me, my friend and his mother the most was that there was absolutely no sound. it was very quite outside. it continued its path past the tree line. 

about 2 minutes later, we saw a helicopter flying around in the area moving in the same direction as the unidentified object. though, it could have just been an emergency medical helicopter as we tend to see a lot of those in our area.

**i'm very happy i got the chance to report this! this is my first time seeing something in the sky that i was unable to explain!
content.summary: 3 witnesses - exceptional clear night - no blinking lights - no trail - very bright - steady, very constant, slow pace - unwavering brightness - absolutely no sound - helicopter to follow.

content.detailedDescription: While looking over the skies above woodheys park off kenmore rd i noticed to balls of bluish white light (different coloured to the stars) hovering, the balls quickly parted away from each over both moving in an irratic zig zag motion untill 1 shot of into the sky as quick as the eye could see followed a second or 2 after by the second ball of light. both balls of light dissapeared in a blink of an eye upwards. there was no cloud cover.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 blueish white balls of light hovered, maneuverd then ascended

content.detailedDescription:
Was at the beach just before sunset noticed a craft 
in the sky leaving to short idf a contrail traveling sebut slipping in
its path first tought it was a military plane but it
had no outline , lost sigjt of it speed was greater than a passenger jet 
thiught it was a military plane but it acted more like 
a fiery object and contrails seemed to short for a plane.
content.summary: Thought at first military plane but it was aline than anither similar to itappeared traveling west

content.detailedDescription: 38 year old son-in-law, 12 year old grandson, and myself (63 year old male) were fishing on my back yard dock in cape coral, florida at about 10 pm.  my grandson said, "what's that in the sky?"  we all observed a strobing pinpoint of light at extreme altitude (much higher than most commercial airline flights) at about 45 degrees of elevation in the ese, flying generally in a northerly direction.  it was moving at a very fast, though fixed, speed and strobing in a regular tempo. during the 10 seconds or so that we initially observed it, it transversed maybe 5 degrees of arc.  (that was extremely fast considering it's apparent altitude). it suddenly disappeared.  there were scattered clouds that night and i initially thought the clouds had obscured it.  less than 10 seconds later, my son-in-law shouted "there it is!" and we observed it a full 30 to 40 degrees north (yet still in line of flight) of where we had initially seen it.  it was like it had skipped instantly over many many miles.  very strange.  i do not believe this was an airplane nor a satellite.  if my estimates of elevation and trigonometric calculations are correct, this thing covered at least 5 miles in 10 seconds from the time it disappeared until it reappeared.  previously, it seemed to be moving exceptionally fast, but the speed at which it jumped forwards during the few seconds it was invisible seemed impossible.  all three of us observers thought this sighting was exceptionally strange.  when we described this to other family members, we endured some good-natured teasing and derision.
content.summary: Strobing light observed at extreme altitude.  vanished completely.  re-appeared at 30-40 degrees of arc within seconds

content.detailedDescription:
Outside on my property viewed two unusual bright "stars" close together to the northwest relatively low to the horizon between a pair of trees. estimated to be magnitude 0 or possibly even brighter, and immediately felt they were unfamiliar in the sky, two stars, that bright, that close together. then i noticed they were slowly moving together against the background, eventually passing behind a tree, emerging out again on the other side of it, before disappearing from my view altogether behind the next set of trees. 

my initial thought is that they must be satellites, but it was quite late into the evening, and it is the middle of winter. far too deep into earth shadow for a low earth orbiting satellite to be in sunlight. they were also moving very slow for satellites, so i gave some thought to the possibility of higher orbiting satellites, but they were very bright for that to seem likely. i checked a satellite database on my phone which revealed no passing satellites. i checked for iridium flares scheduled for my location, but none were scheduled at this time, and it appears even iridium satellites don't flare that late at night at this time of year here. plus, there were two of these lights. i considered the possibility that these were like the noss triplets. i saw a set of noss triplets in 1997, and this was similar. the noss triplets are out of formation now, but apparently the chinese yaogan satellites fly in formation. i checked their known orbits and they don't seem like they were in the neighbourhood. i also believe their altitude places them too low to be in sunlight at that time of night. i am highly confident that these were not planes. solid white/yellow steady star-like light, no sound, no nearby airports, very little air traffic on this part of the coast at all really.

honestly, i am stumped. i thought i would share, in case it's of any value to anyone, or if we are fortunate enough to learn of other reports.
content.summary: Two bright star-like lights moving in formation

content.detailedDescription: It was some time in the middle of school break as a child when i was 8 yrs old i remember looking out of the trailer window at a light i noticed that seemed to be fairly bright in the eastern sky just above the tree line ,upon closer inspection out the window i could make out a detailed discription of an object that looked like a ufo, it was disc shaped with a white dome on top the lower section was alternating in red and white panels my mom was watching m.A.S.H. on tv in the front of the trailer and it was about 7 pm. as i kept staring out the window time seemed to change all of a sudden.It was now 10 pm and my mom called from the back of the trailer to me asking to go to bed, the object was still there in the eastern sky then as i looked back to tell my mom about the object i glanced out the window but it was gone.I told her what i had seen but she said go to bed. 3 hrs had past in that time it was almost as if time stoped for me and i dont know what happend during those 3 hrs other than i was looking out the window.
content.summary: Red and white paneled disc shaped object with white dome about a mile away

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone out to the front yard right after dark to set off some fireworks with the kids while my wife watched from the upstairs window.  we were cleaning up when i asked my son to come over and check out a light hovering over house tops to the east.  it was extremely bright and orange, and appeared to me that light made star like spines.  no sound.  perfectly stable, it then rose, leveled off, and headed to the west.  at this point i called for my daughter and told my son to get my wife and the camera.  there is some spotty camera documentation.  we all witnessed it pass our house, than instantly turn to the north and speed out of sight.  we were able to view through binoculars as well.  we went inside and not five minutes later taylor called that it was back.  we all ran back out and witnessed two more with similar flight plans to the first.  these were not airplanes, fireworks,flares,helicopters, etc.   very few explanations.  my whole family saw it.  i was amazed when i googled it and how many people saw the same orange orbs on the same day. 

my folks live across the street, so the family shared the experience with them on wednesday.  my kids were spending the night over at their house tonight.  i got a frenzied call to come over they were watching another sighting in the same general location.  my parents house sits up much higher, so they were watching from the upper bonus room window.  my mom swears to what she saw with the kids (9&12).  it was a bright white, large saucer that hovered over power lines to the east, moving as it hovered, then sped away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two witnessed sightings within two days by at least three individuals each each time

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was walking south on jackson street, and saw the brightest star above the silos. to my great surprise, it began to  slowly move north. and then, it zoomed abruptly east, very fast, out of sight.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star started to move

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos of a chemtrail in the sky.  it was really bright.  i did not look at my photos until the next day.  i noticed ufo in all the photos i took.  i took 2 on my camera and 2 on my kindle.
content.summary: Taking photo of chemtrail when object dropped down from in front of the sun.  appeared red/yellow in photo.

content.detailedDescription: We were leaving a nye party. driving north on magnolia st. in huntington beach, ca. i was in the passenger seat and was talking to friends who were in the back. i went to reach behind me to adjust my seatbelt and the orange lights caught my eye. three stationary orbs were in the sky and they stayed as we continued our drive. all of us in the car saw them. there were a ton of planes in the air that night because the airport had a delay (which we read about the next day) for whatever reason... but the difference between a plane and something you can't explain is obvious. these were not moving... they were closer to the us than planes could be. had no flashing lights like you see on planes and these were not moving. they were glowing a bright orange color. i was in disbelief at what i was seeing and the rest of the passengers were as well but you kind of try to explain it away. i had posted the sighting as soon as i got home on facebook and come to find out... many other party goers from the same party we attended, who had left earlier and later than we did throughout the night.... saw them also. we saw them. they saw them and we don't know what the hell were looking at. some people posted that they had to be those paper lanterns people let go of at midnight on nye... but those would have been in motion. i did not get photos because i didn't want to take my eyes off them. we eventually lost sight of them as we drove farther down the street.
content.summary: Saw three orange orbs in sky. they did not move and did not flash like planes would. closer to us then planes.

content.detailedDescription: Three adults and three kids in backyard of west phoenix home.  noticed orange ball of light appearing from the north, traveling south.  the light remained a spherical shape, approximately a golf-ball size - much larger than anything in the sky.  the light would occasionally stop, change direction, then travel again in a southern direction.  there was no noise, or any sounds coming from the area of the light.  the light flickered a bit then disappeared at about 45 degrees from the southern horizon.  no one in the yard had ever seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Phoenix new year 2014 ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos in l.A . i didnt notice this object until i reviewed my photos. many people have seen this photo and are quite amazed. just above the hi-rise to the left. zoom in and you will see . thats about all that is needed to describe this. ive never seen or reported any type of ufo before. all legitimate .  if you cant view the image please provide me with an email address and i will send an attachment .
content.summary: Rectangular object. large in size over building

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the front deck of house looking at the stars. i notice a fast moving light running across the sky, then went into a hovering mood. it left and return. disk shape with pulsating with green and red lights. many people in area witness it.
content.summary: Flying in a stright line at high speed then stop.  then moving up and down

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed the orbs near taco bell first noticed one pair in the middle of skyline moving west to east this pair seemed to be orbiting around one another at first one from the pair then flew off to the north out of sight the other continued to the east until out of sight shortly after they went out of sight another pair came into sight traveling from the west in a straight line one at a higher elevation than the other about mid skyline one of these also went north out of sight as the other continued east until also out of sight then as i traveled from one sight to another noticed a single orb flying south to north the best sighting was observed at a sight west of taco bell from a parking lot another single orb flying south to north this one was also witnessed by a co-worker there was cloud cover that night so they were below the cloud line they seemed to be traveling at a pretty good rate of speed if the first pair had not been flying around one another i might not have even noticed them as that's what caught my eye not sure what to think when something of this nature appears doesn't seem to be a rational explanation at this point the objects best described would be an orange red light there is a sense that more is going on than most people would like to admit regardless if they were military or something not so earthly they made no audible noise had no headlights and also void of any visible strobes
content.summary: Total of six orbs spotted

content.detailedDescription: Red glowing ball flying across the sky. didn't have blinking lights or didn't seem to be anything i have ever seen before. tried to take a pic. but later looked and it came back all black.
content.summary: Never saw this ever before

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1951 i was 6 years old, out playing in the front of our house. i heard a swishing noise and looked up to see what it was. it was a hot sunny day without any breeze. about 50-60 feet above me was a saucer shaped vehicle hovering and spinning. it caused all of the leaves on the tree to fold and turn downward as if trying to avoid radiation or some sort of emissions. electro magnetic maybe. i was waiting for my grandmother to call me in for lunch so it was probably about noon. the saucer hovered for about 2 minutes and tilted toward me. at that time it moved away from my yard and landed behind some trees blocking it's view from my house. i ran into the house and told my grandmother what i had seen and she just blew it off. i was sitting on my bed looking out the window in the back of the house when i saw the 2 beings passing along the outer edge of our yard behind some peach trees. they were different heights. one was a half head shorter than the other. they seemed to be wearing suits which were rouge red in color. they were walking side by side and moved out of sight from my window. that was my last memory until about 10pm. my grandmother and i were standing in the kitchen in the dark and lunch was still sitting out on the counter. at one point i know i was in the saucer. it had a window and i could see the road below. i think we were over the blue ridge mountains which were visible from our house on a clear day. we were hovering above a car traveling along a winding mountain road. i was watching the headlights from the car flashing into the woods as it went around curves. i think we may have taken them but can't remember a lot. i don't recall any words ever being spoken but they showed me lights off in the distance and said that was where i lived. i had never been in a plane so watching that car below was something i'll never forget.
one of them was 5 feet tall and the other about 6ft or maybe a little less.
when i realized i was home there was blood on my legs and feet dried. i never felt any pain or had any effects from this and didn't think about it again until i was about 15 yrs old. i had an exam by a gynecologist and i overheard the doctor asking my mother who had done the surgery on me. i had never had surgery or sex. i thought back to that night finding the blood on myself. this has happened more than one so i know thay have some sort of tracking device inside my body. i'm now in florida and they did some sort of scanning on me. i have a lot of details and would even consent to hypnotherapy. i don't mind others knowing but fact is, most don't believe it if you tell them. contact me if you wish and we will go onto further details. i'm 68 years old and am not a nut case.I've never had any mental problems. i have a friend who is an fbi agent and i gave him the written detail as well. thanks for listening. have a great new year,
content.summary: It hovered over me then landed about a 100 ft. away then 2 beings came back to my house  and took me for about 10 hours. it happened at least 2 times.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a flying orange orb(organic) 1/1/14 12:05 am,  i live in the san francisco hills looking at the excelsior district from my deck.  this intelligent craft was  flying below from my deck view,  and i can tell you this was not  a chinese lantern, in fact this craft was flying fast and making extreme flying maneuvers and as low as 5th floor building then it flew south going up over the san bruno mountain park,  this event happened twice, the second time it did a different route,  i am not sure if there were 2 of them but it took about 2 minutes for the second time to show up

both times this orbs was  flying at  high speed and making sharp flying maneuvers,  it flew twice over the excelsior district, the amazing part of this story i saw this craft  flying from above because i live in the twin peak hills,  my phone camera is not working and the only witness is my wife
content.summary: I live in the hills so this orange orb was flying all over the city, south east of san francisco

content.detailedDescription: 11:34pm myself and my wife and our neighbor saw a flameball object from s/sw.Flaming orb traveled in a n/nw direction. flaming orb seemed fast at first glance but slowed, and turned quickly west, slowed-to-stop, then faded out. 2/3 minutes after first flaming orb faded out, a second flaming orb seemed to materialize(fade in).The second flaming orb appeared, moved nw for a split-second then turned w, slowed down, then faded out. me and wife recorded some of the event on our cell phones, but video quality is not very good. i am pretty clear about what i saw. if there is a way to tell my experiance to a person(insted of this computer message), i could explain the event with greater detail. i am going to attept to enhance our cell phone videos as to add greater information regarding this event.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Two fireball like objects from ssw flying nnw. orb1ssw-nw(w)orb2ssw-w

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to pick up my daughter after a new years party, it was a cloudy pitch black night no stars or moon light, it was straight ahead of me in my driving line of sight, red,orange lights shaped like a triangle or diamond. i decided to pull out my cell phone and take a picture just in case it was something(not a very good picture since i was driving and it was far off, but you can see the colors and basic shape)it didn't appear to be moving i don't know if that is because i was moving or what. i lost sight when my road turned the opposite direction.
in hindsight i wish i would of pulled over and got more pictures.


the picture actually looks worse on here than on my phone, the streaks are because i was moving, not the object(the white glow at the bottom of the pic. is my headlights). (this is actually the second pic. i took, the first one was much better but, someone txted me before i could save it and the second one was a hurry pic.) and this is definitely not fireworks it stayed the same shape the entire time.
content.summary: It was pretty far in the distance

content.detailedDescription:
8 ufo's observed( glowing red orange balls and diff shapes) period  of 15- 20 minutes, first observed 1 at about 10:30 pm 12-31-13,  watch complete path of about 7-8 miles across the horizon coming from the north. this stop and hovered till it kinda phased out.
watch sky for another 1/2 hr and seen nothing.15 min before celebration went outside and 3 more coming same  path with no noise and hovered same area as the first one, and as they where phasing out 2 more same path and 3 more all had same path but not in a line. they all stopped and hovered in same area.
no jets or planes seen during this event. photos attached need magnified then you can see mist and shapes of ufo's
content.summary: 8 ufo's observed period  of 15- 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting outside at night at the park with my girlfriend
2.Girlfriend said to me "i thought i just seen some lightning"
3. i knew it wasn't lightning because it was three perfectly straight separate beams then when we seen the orange orb follow the beams, it just confirmed we weren't imagining it.
4.After my girlfriend commenting "i thought i just seen some lightning" on a clear cloudless night i looked up and seen three bright beams almost laser like shoot from the sw to the ne, as i saw them i told my girlfriend to look up and she saw them as well then shortly after a bright orange beach ball sized orb or even a little bigger followed in the exact same direction as the beams went.
5.Feelings and actions were amazement and was glad someone else saw it as well so i knew i wasn't going crazy. we then just continued to observe the night sky after that. i had seen a few other unexplained things earlier in my life that didn't come close to this sighting.
6.It was moving really fast, faster then an f-18 for sure and was silent. it just disappeared with distance.
content.summary: Bright white lightning like beams followed by orange orb

content.detailedDescription:
I came out to my balcony, saw a red-yellow light coming from where the ocean is (miami beach direction) it was a light moving very fast, not like airplanes do, it  was going up as if it was a missile, then started coming down and changed its path going towards the south. no sound ever came from it, with the naked eyed it looked like a 5 pointed star.

by the time i started filming it with my phone about a minute had passed since i first saw it. this was a great experience if it is a real ufo. searching the internet today 1/01/14 there had been a lot of sighting reported on new years eve.

it was a cloudy night and it was a little windy.

this took place in the coral gables are of miami fl.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Came out to my balcony, saw a red-yellow light go up as if it was a missile, then came down and changed its path. no sound from it, with the naked eyed it looked like a 5 pinted star.

content.detailedDescription:
1/1/14 0020
looking south from chandler, az (down to casa grande) we noticed 4 lights that were orange and red in color. i initially thought this to be chinese lanterns, but the objects changed flight path with radical 90 degree movements. two would remain on top side by side, with 1 in the center below. # 4 would fly horizontally and take the place of the one in the center. they would fly as 4, then 1 would disappear. the light would go dim, then get bright again. these objects remained within the same altitude and made very little side to side movement. as they started to go dim, i stopped watching when there were only two left. this was probably 0045am.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Notice 3 lights, appeared as chinese lantern, but changed elevation. would have been located over low populated region. changed flight path frequently in 90 degree movements

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and myself were in our living-room watching a movie. all of a sudden my husband and i noticed a shadow that passed by the sun, obviously caused by a large object. at the time though, we thought nothing of it & then we heard a loud "bang" loud as a cannon, or as if a transformer had blown. at that moment power went out for a few seconds then right back on. this prompted my husband to look out the window & down the street where he noticed our neighbors were standing outside as if their power had went out also. (it did & they also heard the sound) our neighbors went back inside. (their power as well as ours was back on) when my husband walked away from the window, that is when i went over & looked out & up toward the sky. (i always was & still am a "sky-watcher")
when i looked out to the west, i saw a huge black object with many black spheres attached to it. it wasn't making a sound, but it was moving at a rapid pace yet, gracefully into the southwest where it disappeared into a sun-lit cloud. (i hollered for my husband to come back to the window to see it, but just as he got to the window is when it disappeared into the cloud leaving me the only one to see this) when i first saw it, i thought it must have been a group of birds, but i know that wasn't the case. this object didn't move like a flock of birds and was far too large because of the distance. i stood there straining my eyes because of the brightness of the white & well lit cloud, i kept watching anyway to see it come back out, as i was not wanting to believe my eyes. i stood there about three minutes just observing & reflecting on the occurrence. the object never did come back out. it was as if it vanished into nothingness.
content.summary: Large black ufo effecting power to the neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting near my window watching fireworks for new year's eve.  saw an orange glow floating upward and fully expected it to explode into fireworks, but instead, it began to pulse and glow stronger.  had it been descending, i might have considered it was a flare, but it ascended. 

it did not have the lights of an airplane, which we alaskans are so used to seeing around here.  in fact, it was in a flight path area that is often shared between the air force at elmendorf, and merrill field, which accommodates small civilian aircraft.  in my opinion, this could not have been a plane or a helicopter, unless it was some new toy or gadget i've never seen before.

the object ascended and then began to travel south.  sometimes it looked like a disc and sometimes a sphere.  when it looked like a sphere, it reminded me of a larger view of mars.  however, it continued to travel south at a moderate rate of speed and then just vanished from view.  the light just seemed to get smaller and smaller until it disappeared.

i didn't get to video-tape the 1st part of my observation, but husband and i followed our view from the window to our front door, where i asked him to grab the camera.  so i caught a small piece of it from that view on video.  it was too dark to get anything but black sky and the object, and when i tried to zoom in, i'd lose my "aim" with the camera.

i had read this morning californians had seen some orange lights, too, so thought it would be prudent to ask mufon if they knew anything about this in anchorage, alaska.
content.summary: Orange pulsating disc to sphere, floating upward, then flying south at night.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside at night around 10 pm and looking at the pegasis moon in october. i saw a orange round object approach the moon and then pass behind the moon. the object appeared to be about 1/4 size of the moon. i  have no idea about the elevation or size of the object.
i have two pictures taken about 10 seconds apart and you can see the distance and elevation the object traveled.

i saw the object while looking at the moon.

i do not know what it as, other then unusual.

the object passed behind the moon.

the photos are in order as taken.
content.summary: I was looking at the moon and saw an round orange object approach the moon and then pass behind it. i have photos.
